attributes.action: Reduce the number of MPs at Westminster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we need so many snouts to the gravy train in Westminster? We have a European Civil Service that actually rules the union and a European Parliament (what a laugh)that we vote for. Westminster therefore is just there to rubber stamp European legislation. Hey - I could do that, for a lot less money too!
